- [93mOlefin[0m [93mmetathesis[0m of [93mphospholipids[0m by [93mRuthenium[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mcatalysts[0m in [93msolution[0m and on [93mliposomes[0m under [93mbiologically[0m [93mrelevant[0m [93mconditions[0m.: The [93mlast[0m [93mdecade[0m [93mhas[0m [93mseen[0m a [93mlot[0m of [93minterest[0m in [93mclassical[0m [93morganometallic[0m [93mcatalysis[0m [93mperformed[0m [93mintracellularly[0m, or at [93mleast[0m under [93mbiological[0m [93mconditions[0m ([93m37[0m °[93mC[0m, [93mair[0m, [93mwater[0m). [93mOne[0m [93msuch[0m [93mclassical[0m [93mreaction[0m is [93molefin[0m [93mmetathesis[0m ([93mOM[0m), which is [93mextremely[0m [93mcommon[0m in [93mpreparative[0m [93morganic[0m [93mchemistry[0m, [93mhowever[0m under [93mnon[0m-[93mbiological[0m [93mconditions[0m ([93mesp[0m. [93morganic[0m [93msolvents[0m).
